---
title: 18 - Once a visitor asked Bhagwan what was Dharma and what was Adharma
author: Visitor
date: "04/01/2020"
categories: [Conversations]
---
Once a visitor asked Bhagwan what was Dharma and what was Adharma. To this our beloved Bhagwan thundered and said that remembering God was Dharma and forgeting God was Adharma. He then added remembering the Name was remembering God and remembering God is living in God.
 
Please follow the [link](https://youtu.be/MSTNd19WW2w?si=h_XFv4BSFaHBRa0e) for the satsang in youtube.
